events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to know how I can return it and get a refund.
The reported issue has been classified under Refund since the customer is requesting a return and refund for a purchased item.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new and hasn't been worn except to try it on once.
Thanks for the info! You can return the jacket using our prepaid label. Once we receive it in its original condition, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I'll ship it back tomorrow using the label.
Great! Please feel free to reach out anytime if you need further assistance. Weâ€™ll notify you once the refund is processed.
Just checking in to confirm that your returned jacket has been received and your refund processed. Let us know if everything is okay.
